      • Record

        public Record​(int courseID,
              int studentID,
              int[] SessionChoice,
              int numComponents,
              double examWeight,
              double[] courseworkWeight)
        Constructor for record
        Parameters:
        courseID - identification number of the courses the student has registered
        studentID - identification number of the student
        SessionChoice - identification number of the lab,tutorial or laboratory the student is registered to
        numComponents - number of coursework components
        examWeight - weightage of the exam mark
        courseworkWeight - weightage of coursework mark
